message.content:
cs.IT, cs.ITP, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper deals with information theory and entropy, which are core topics in computer science. The paper also discusses statistical applications, which suggests a focus on machine learning and data science. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.IT (Information Theory), cs.ITP (Information Theory and Probability), and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also touches on the topic of data structures (cs.DS) and statistical inference (cs.SI), which are relevant sub-categories.
